name: Bowlmaster (Cyril Malec)
description:
Bowling. IN SPACE! It's also the 80s.

This is a simple 10 pin bowling game, as part of the Gamedev.TV Unity C# course.

Also, it's free!


Controls:

-menu selection: mouse

-nudge ball: mouse (click on the arrows)

-launch the ball: drag the ball. With the mouse.

Then let go of the ball. With the mouse.

(-Quit mid-game: Alt + F4 and I totally would not blame you for it :) )

Credits:

-Fonts:

https://www.dafont.com/fr/score-board-st.font

https://www.dafont.com/fr/1900805.font
